org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema

Class NiDimension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema.NiDimension
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HardcodedNiDimension, TabularSourcedNiDimension

    public abstract class NiDimension
extends java.lang.Object
    a class describing a set of related Columns, arranged in a stack. There might be multiple Columns on a given level of the stack. This class only references level ids; it is up to the Schema to map columns to levels within the dimension identity comparisons are good here by design.
    Use by it defining fetchDimension()

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NiDimension.Coordinate 
      static class  NiDimension.LevelColumn
      a class signaling that a column is a level in a multi-column Dimension (for example: "Donor type" in the "Organizations" dimension or Primary Sector SubSubSector in the "Sectors" dimension)
      static class  NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage
      an immutable class for managing an instance of a Dimension (e.g.
